Educative | Seattle, WA | Part-Time | Contract | Computer Science Instructor, Machine Learning Instructor, Data Science Instructor, Web Development Instructor | REMOTE | https://www.educative.io

Educative is an interactive learning platform for software engineers. Instructors create lessons using Educative's course builder. Students learn using coding playgrounds, embedded web applications, coding challenges, etc. without the need to install anything on their machines.

We are looking for experts in Computer Science, Machine Learning, Web Development and Data Science to create Interactive Courses on multiple subjects. All jobs are contract based with flexible deadlines.

We work with engineers with a knack for creating courses, bootcamp instructors, university professors and students who have taken advanced CS courses.
